title: Sans serif — In the flowers Carroll Dunham
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180705im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_n70kb3cHVa1qiyeuko1_500_5298.jpg)

Font: 

 AG Schoolbook 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180705/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: Emma-L

comments.content:
Looks like AG Schoolbook, mixing and matching the regular and two versions or using stylistic alternates to get the correct R and I combination:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ag-schoolbook-bq/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180705/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ag-schoolbook-bq/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/berthold/ag-schoolbook-bq/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180705im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AGSchoolbook1_3446.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180705im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AGSchoolbook2_6535.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180705im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AGSchoolbook3_4943.png)
